subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] 3 DAY LIVE EVENT - starts today Sept 18th Keith Age, Dave and Tom Jones and many more

full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0483_01CA383E.7DEF8F20

I will definitely try and pop in :)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From=
: Misty Dawn 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, September 18, =
2009 5:39 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] 3 DAY LIVE EVENT - starts today Sept 18th=
 Keith Age, Dave and Tom Jones and many more


    Ok guys I said I would t=
ry and give you guys a heads up since many of you enjoyed the past live eve=
nts on PTN so here ya go. Paranormal Television Network is broadcasting ano=
ther live event this weekend September 18th - 20th. 

        www.paranorma=
ltvnetwork.com
        or
        www.paranormaltelevisionnetwork.com

    =
    It will be free to watch and participate in the interactive chat. For m=
ore info you can check out www.octagonhall.com. Afternoon activities includ=
e many guest speakers on a variety of subjects, re-enactors, living history=
 demo's, live cannon fire, raffles, contests, and music along with other ac=
tivities. And yes they will be having a ghosthunt at night there as well fo=
r those who are interested in the paranormal side of the location. 

      =
  Guest speakers at the Octagon Hall commemoration will include Bryan Bush,=
 Dr. Ron Hatcher, Dr. Michael Trapasso, Paul Browning, Keith Age, Chris Ded=
man, and Rhiannon Waits. Paul Browning has written a book entitled Haunting=
s at Octagon Hall. Dave and Tom Jones Para-X Radio CBS Psychiconair Clarksv=
ille Ghost Hunters and a few surprise guests.

        GHOST HUNTERS WILL E=
NCOUNTER
        CIVIL WAR RE-ENACTORS SEPT. 18-20
        AS OCTAGON HALL =
MARKS 150 YEARS


        Franklin, Ky. -- Octagon Hall, an eight-sided bri=
ck antebellum home in Franklin, Ky., is observing the 150th anniversary of =
its completion. A three-day celebration Sept. 18, 19, and 20 will feature C=
ivil War re-enactors and historians alongside paranormal investigators and =
ghost hunters. 



        Looks like another fun weekend event fundraiser =
to help with restoration of a historic landmark. If you cant make it out to=
 the location then come join in watching it LIVE for free.

        Have a =
great day!
        Misty
       



  
------=_NextPart_000_0483_01CA383E.7DEF8F20
